data.message: I unfollowed someone and I still get all the notifications. I am in a group with her too, is that why it won't work?

replies.message: Hi there, Lauri. If you unfollow someone, you should stop seeing their activity on your News Feed. If you're in a group with the same person, you will continue to receive notifications pertaining to that group. To adjust group notification settings, please visit this link: http://on.fb.me/1M3nj4N. We hope this answers your question! -Rey
Me too!!!!! How do u do that Virginia Garcia Castillo????
Mine does the same thing & Im not in any groups
Hope someone can help us figure it out Michelle Blevins Payne. I am still searching for answers and will keep you posted!
Celebrating the end of the blue that has a name that's how to install please help me
